decisions: Mock sidecar for development, swappable to real SDK
Events via Tauri emit (not Channels yet), sidecar stdout -> Rust thread -> frontend
SQLite persistence for messages, store-only for message queue
Arc<Mutex> for thread-safe sidecar manager access
result.summary: Implemented Phase 3: Agent Orchestration. Mock Node.js sidecar with JSON-lines protocol, Rust sidecar manager with Tauri events, agent CRUD commands, SQLite persistence, Zustand agent store, and full Chat UI (MessageBubble, ThinkingBlock, ToolCallBlock, PromptInput, MessageQueue). Event bridge connects backend to frontend.
